title: The Undefeated (Captioned)
creator_credit: Andrew V McLaglen, Robert L. Jacks and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: Two former colonels, one Confederate, the other Union, find themselves in Mexico after the Civil War. Unlikely allies, the two are forced to team up to fight Juarez’ ruthless banditos as well as the Emperor Maximilian’s rampaging army in this epic Western adventure. Starring John Wayne and Rock Hudson.
